Server.Name: Cringe Factory Server
Server.Description:
Server design goals: Make higher level gameplay more interesting and challenging (level 60+). Make bloodmoons more interesting and challenging. Add more weapon options. Add more vehicle options. Add more things to do just for fun. Make stuff a little more realistic (darkness, carry weight, recipies, items, etc.). Add some sort of magic (everyone likes magic).
Modlets Included: - WIP
